name: Eliatopia
description: Explore the new planet of Eliatopia, as you (a human from Earth) set off to explore the newly discovered planet inhabited by aliens. Play with your friends, or make new ones and explore the planet together. Fight monsters and even other players in PVP enabled areas. Progress your character through a huge collection of weapons and armor, skills, and ability points. What dark secrets does Eliatopia and its government hold? And what about it's correlations to Earth? Find out now!
